Articles.Content:
Hello, im new here.

Last night I downloaded the KSP but only today I could play. My first success was rocket flight KRK 'Piast' P1M1 for height over 14 km. Unfortunately I made a mistake and introduced too many new parts and further series of rockets (P2M1 - P2M5) dont take off or explode on the Water Tower in Spaceport

['] for 9 Kerbal's ;P

I'm looking for tips what i need my rockets to get them take off and not to explode

BTW. Great Game Indeed!

Welcome to KSP Forum.

the tips your looking for are

make as much use of the symmetry tool as possible

be generous with the SAS modules

in the long run liquid engines are better. but solid boosters give that extra thrust you might need (good for take off)

dont get top heavy- when you get top heavy at around 5k to 10k you begin to tip.

if a designs stops working it might be time to rethink

lightweight is best. but heavyweight is fun.

i hope you find these use full
